document.full_text: lille won its first french league title since 1954 with a 2-2 draw at paris saint-germain on saturday, clinching the championship with a game to spare.
document.title: lille wins 1st french league title since 1954
lines_and_colors: lille won its first french league title since 1954 with a 2-2 draw at paris saint-germain on saturday, clinching the championship with a game to spare.
